TopicTitle: I like ksp, and a need to blog

Articles.Content:
I have been playing KSP for a 1100 hours [3 years] and can always find a different way of playing it.

A little background, I was involved in the manufacturing of the Facet Opal, Sapphire, and from the start in 76 the Grasshopper, all Australian ultralights. hint hint.

loving the game

MUD

I'd say after 3 years you must have tons of posts to blog until you catch up...

But I know the feeling. I guess it's a bit like when you have to tell your friends about those geeky things you do, which you know they won't understand, so you just go elsewhere and blog.

... Or maybe that's not what you mean, but anyway, welcome.
Unfortunately all my friends are by far not as geeky as I am about Space but I put it in their face as often as I can
